title: Lord and Dragon - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Betrayal   Caring Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Disabilities   Dragons   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Kuudere   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   Royalty   Secret Identity   Secrets   Strong Love Interests   Wars   Weak Protagonist
author: Da Yuan Zi   大圆子
description:
The young lord of a small and weak country saves a dragon beside the sea one day.

Since then, his country became prosperous, rich, and powerful.

This is the story between a Lord who is a tease that refuses to get married, and a poor dragon who is teased day in and day out.>
